PIC32CX-BZ Zigbee API Reference
ZLLDemo application

This application demonstrates main features of ZigBee Light Link Profile and is a good starting point for developing ZigBee Light Link applications.

The application consists of two parts: color light's and for color scene remote's. Both applications should be loaded to Key Remote Control boards. Key Remote Control board's keyboard is used by the color scene remote's application to send commands to a single color light or to a group. The color light's board uses its LCD screen to emulate lamp's behavior by outputting light level and current color, and blinking when identify command is received.

For more detail on this demo applicaiton refer to AVR2060: BitCloud ZigBee Light Link Quick Start Guide.
